name: Pixel Witch Lesson #6
description:
One of the first things new pixel witches must learn is how to extract and refine the pixel-stones used for their spells. Lesson #6 is a set of exercises to help you learn to find the patterns in natural pixel-stone formations.

Features
  • A difficult puzzle game you can take at your own pace.
  • Over a dozen puzzles. But not too many.
  • Calming soundtrack.
